item.title: How do i make myself admin
item.dc:creator: @c4td0g_pwnz_j00 c4td0g pwnz j00
item.description:
@c4td0g_pwnz_j00 wrote:

[TuT] Make Yourself Mod or Admin On TestScape
First, Find this in Client.JAVA

FIND:(Press ctrl+F)
//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

Then You Shall See this Below that

Code:
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“freeslot”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“freeslot”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“freeslot”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“freeslot”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“freeslot”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“freeslot”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“freeslot”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“freeslot”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“freeslot”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“freeslot”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“freeslot”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“freeslot”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“freeslot”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}

To make you, ( or anyone else ) Owner, Admin or Moderator see where it says freeslot change that to what you username you want and then it will turn to that player rights , like if i changed freeslot with c4td0g i will be the player rights it says near it so go off and change it Hope it works,
EXAMPLE:
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“c4td0g”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

Player Rights = 1 ( Mod ) you get silver crown
Player Rights = 2 ( Admin ) evryone sees your gold crown
Player Rights = 3 ( Owner ) You cant see your gold crown but others can(BUG)

Fixing owners cant see crown bug

Purpose: Client.java

Difficulty: i Rate it a 1.

Assumed Knowledge: Same as above…

Credits: 100% Credits to cook

Find

Code:
out.write(playerRights);Delete that^ and replace it whit.

Code:
if (playerRights == 3) {
out.write(2); //Crown fixup
} else {
out.write(playerRights); // mod level
}

AND there ya go mate, cheers

Read full topic
